Title: Admin Login with Valid Credentials
Test case name/Objective: Verify admin can login with valid credentials
Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091
Test Steps: 1. Send POST request to /users/login 2. Include valid admin email and password in request body 3. Verify response
Expected Result: Status: 200; Response contains access_token and token_type
Actual Result: Status: 200; Response contains access_token and token_type='bearer'
Remark: Token case sensitivity inconsistency - expected 'Bearer' but got 'bearer'

Title: Regular User Login with Valid Credentials
Test case name/Objective: Verify regular user can login with valid credentials
Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091
Test Steps: 1. Send POST request to /users/login 2. Include valid user email and password in request body 3. Verify response
Expected Result: Status: 200; Response contains access_token and token_type
Actual Result: Status: 200; Response contains access_token and token_type='bearer'
Remark: Token case sensitivity inconsistency - expected 'Bearer' but got 'bearer'

Title: Get All Brands - Valid Request
Test case name/Objective: Verify brands endpoint returns all brand data
Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091
Test Steps: 1. Send GET request to /brands 2. Verify response contains brand array
Expected Result: Status: 200; Response contains array of brands
Actual Result: Status: 200; Response contains brand array with multiple brands
Remark: API returns complete brand list

Title: Get All Brands - With Parameter ID 2
Test case name/Objective: Verify brands endpoint behavior with parameters
Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091
Test Steps: 1. Send GET request to /brands 2. Verify response contains brand data
Expected Result: Status: 200; Response contains filtered brand list
Actual Result: Status: 200; Response contains brand array with all brands
Remark: Parameter ignored - expected filtered results but got all brands

Title: Unauthenticated Add Product Request
Test case name/Objective: Verify system requires authentication for favorites
Precondition: No authentication provided
Test Steps: 1. Send POST request to /favorites without authentication 2. Include valid product_id 3. Verify authentication error
Remark: Inconsistent error response format - expected {error: 'Unauthorized'} but got {message: 'Unauthorized'}

Title: Invalid Token Add Product Request
Test case name/Objective: Verify system validates authentication tokens
Precondition: Invalid authentication token provided
Test Steps: 1. Send POST request to /favorites with invalid token 2. Include valid product_id 3. Verify authentication error
Remark: Inconsistent error response format - expected {error: 'Unauthorized'} but got {message: 'Unauthorized'}

Title: SQL Injection in Product ID (No Auth)
Test case name/Objective: Verify authentication blocks SQL injection attempts
Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091
Test Steps: 1. Send POST request to /favorites without authentication 2. Include SQL injection payload in product_id 3. Verify authentication error
Expected Result: Status: 401; Authentication required (SQL injection blocked by auth layer)
Remark: Authentication layer prevents SQL injection attempts

Title: XSS Attempt in Product ID (No Auth)
Test case name/Objective: Verify authentication blocks XSS attempts
Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091
Test Steps: 1. Send POST request to /favorites without authentication 2. Include XSS payload in product_id 3. Verify authentication error
Expected Result: Status: 401; Authentication required (XSS blocked by auth layer)
Remark: Authentication layer prevents XSS attempts
